verse.name: v1
verse.lines: A blind man sits alone

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Can't see who's coming down the road

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: While it's Jesus coming to give Him his sight

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: He rejoices in the miracle

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: But can't find the words to say

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: When the people ask “What happen on that day?”

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: He said…

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: One thing I know, new life He gave me

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: I know from darkness He saved me

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: I was forsaken, 'til Jesus found me

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: I can't tell you how it happened

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: I don't know why He chose me

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: One thing I know that I was blind but now I see.

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: After all He's done for me

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Where He came for my sin

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: And paid the debt to buy my liberty

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: I don't know just how He loved me so

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: For how He changed my life that day

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: But because He did,

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: Thank God now I can see.

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: (I know new life He gave me)

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: I Know

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: (I know from darkness He saved me)

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: I was forsaken, til Jesus found me.

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: I can't tell you how it happened,

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: I don't know why He chose me.

verse.name: v27
verse.lines: One thing I know that I was blind but I see

verse.name: v28
verse.lines: One thing I know that I was blind,

verse.name: v29
verse.lines: But now I see!
